Docs.summary: Compares this instance of to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
Docs.returns:
A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and the object.
Return Value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than object.
Zero
This instance is the same as object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than object
-or-
object is a null reference ()

Docs.param: The position of the byte to be retrieved.
Docs.summary: Gets the single byte from the property located at the position indicated by the integer parameter, .
Docs.value: The byte located at the position indicated by the integer parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If `index` indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, an exception is raised.
To avoid raising an exception, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString.IsNull%2A> property and the `Length` property before reading `this`.
This property is read-only.
